intro: Tetrastigma jaichagunii, commonly known as the Jaichagunii grape vine, is a flowering plant belonging to the Vitaceae family. It is characterized by its climbing habit and compound leaves with three to five leaflets. The plant produces small, greenish-white flowers that give way to yellowish berries. Native to Southeast Asia, it thrives in humid, tropical environments. Due to its ornamental and potential medicinal value, it is of interest to botanists and horticulturists.
